short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome theme that will give you a better experience and give your chrome a fresh look.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome theme has a decent analog clock, with different background image each time you will add a new tab with a fresh new quote.
